Miami.Peacock Park:
Peacock Park is a 9.4-acre (38,000 m2) public, urban park in the Coconut Grove neighborhood of Miami, Florida on the shore of Biscayne Bay.


== History ==
Among the first permanent settlers in South Florida were grocers Charles and Isabella Peacock who arrived in Coconut Grove encouraged to establish a hotel. Their hotel, built in 1883, was called Bay View House and was the first hotel on mainland Florida south of Palm Beach.
